question_stem.en:
A 60-year-old man is brought to the emergency department due to altered mental status. His wife says that he has a nagging cough that seemed to worsen over the past several months and that he also began experiencing occasional dizziness earlier this week. Over the last couple of days, the patient has become increasingly confused, and today he "does not make any sense at all." He has no significant past medical history but has smoked a pack of cigarettes daily for the last 40 years. On physical examination, the patient is incoherent but has an otherwise normal neurologic examination.

Laboratory results are as follows:

Serum chemistry
Sodium 120 mEq/L
Potassium 4.0 mEq/L
Blood urea nitrogen 12 mg/dL
Creatinine 0.8 mg/dL
Calcium 9.0 mg/dL
Glucose 98 mg/dL

Plasma osmolality 250 mOsm/kg
Urine drug screen negative

Chest x-ray reveals a mass in the right lung {{exhibit_1}}.
question_stem.zh:
一名60岁男性因精神状态改变被送往急诊科。他的妻子说，他有一个令人烦恼的咳嗽，在过去的几个月里似乎越来越严重，并且他本周早些时候也开始出现偶尔的头晕。在过去的几天里，患者变得越来越困惑，今天他“根本没有任何意义”。他没有重要的既往病史，但过去40年来每天吸一包香烟。体格检查显示，患者语无伦次，但神经系统检查正常。

实验室结果如下：

血清化学
钠 120 mEq/L
钾 4.0 mEq/L
血尿素氮 12 mg/dL
肌酐 0.8 mg/dL
钙 9.0 mg/dL
葡萄糖 98 mg/dL

血浆渗透压 250 mOsm/kg
尿液药物筛查阴性

胸部 X 光片显示右肺有肿块 {{exhibit_1}}。

question.en: Which of the following additional findings is most likely to be present in this patient?
question.zh: 在这种情况下，患者最有可能出现以下哪种额外的发现？

A.en: Bilateral crackles at the lung bases

D.zh: 外观正常的血容量状态

summary.en:
This question tests knowledge of the syndrome of inappropriate antidiuretic hormone secretion (SIADH), its causes (particularly small cell lung cancer), and its clinical presentation, including euvolemic hyponatremia. It also tests the ability to differentiate SIADH from other causes of hyponatremia.

To solve this question, recognize the clues pointing to SIADH: hyponatremia, lung mass (suggesting small cell lung cancer), and altered mental status. Recall that SIADH typically presents with euvolemic hyponatremia, meaning the patient has a normal-appearing volume status.
summary.zh:
此题考察对不适当抗利尿激素分泌综合征 (SIADH) 的认识，包括其病因（尤其是小细胞肺癌）及其临床表现，包括等血容量性低钠血症。它还测试了将 SIADH 与其他低钠血症病因区分开来的能力。

要解决这个问题，需要识别指向 SIADH 的线索：低钠血症、肺部肿块（提示小细胞肺癌）和精神状态改变。回想一下，SIADH 通常表现为等血容量性低钠血症，这意味着患者具有外观正常的血容量状态。
